Class Chest

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tile
      • Obstacle
        • Chest

  • public class Chest
extends Obstacle
    The Chest class creates a Chest that the player can recieve new Cards from.

    Chest

    Date: 2016/06/01

    Version:
    1 2016/06/01
    Author:
    David White and Sepehr Hosseini

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chest(Sprite[] animChest, Sprite background, Card newCard)
      This constructor creates a Card that will be a number with a value and image.

      This method is used to return the text shown when the Chest is interacted with.

      This method is used to determine what will happen when the Chest is interacted with.

      • Chest

        public Chest(Sprite[] animChest,
             Sprite background,
             Card newCard)
        This constructor creates a Card that will be a number with a value and image.
        Parameters:
        animChest[] - the Sprite array of Chest images.
        newCard - the Card that will be added to the Deck.
        background - the Sprite that the text will be displayed on.
